%%{Retail_Inventory}}}%% sequenceDiagram participant User participant Vault as YieldVaultMultiAsset
(Retail_Inventory) participant Aave as Aave V3 Pool
(Retail_CustomerLoyalty) participant RSC as YieldOptimizerRsc
(Retail_Inventory) participant Callback as Callback Proxy
(Retail_OrderManagement) Note over User,Callback: Yield Monitoring and Rebalancing Flow User->>Vault: triggerYieldSnapshot(Retail_CustomerLoyalty) Vault->>Aave: getReserveData(Retail_CustomerLoyalty) Aave-->>Vault: liquidityRate, APY data Vault->>Vault: Calculate APYs for all assets Vault-->>RSC: emit YieldSnapshot(Retail_PointOfSale) Note over RSC: RSC analyzes yield data RSC->>RSC: Compare APYs across assets RSC->>RSC: Determine optimal allocation alt Yield difference exceeds threshold RSC->>Callback: emit Callback(Retail_OrderManagement) Callback->>Vault: executeRebalance(Retail_Inventory) Vault->>Vault: Update asset allocations Vault-->>User: Funds rebalanced to higher yield else Yield difference below threshold Note over RSC: No rebalance needed end
